ISSUE.TITLE: Current Dev: Dexcom Bridge not working (NS Dev as of 2020-07-27)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** Current Dev: Dexcom Bridge not working (NS Dev as of 2020-07-27). **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: Loop: CGM upload readings OFF (Dexcom G6) NS Heroku Config Vars for Dexcom Bridge as specified here: http://www.nightscout.info/wiki/welcome/set-up-nightscout-using-heroku Nightscout Dev as of 2020-07-27 deployed on Heroku. Result: No CGM data Deployed reverted NS-Dev repository as of end of June 2020: CGM from G6 loads from Dexcom Share (Bridge). Possibly some problem with Bridge introduced in recent Dev?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #2 from nightscout/master update to nightscout 14.0

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Update package.json updated dexcom share 2 ns bridge dependency based on this issue here: https://github.com/nightscout/cgm-remote-monitor/issues/5795
